016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.NullNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
023import org.neo4j.graphdb.Node;
024
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.io.InputStream;
027import java.net.URL;
028import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
029import java.util.*;
030import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
031import java.util.function.Function;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033import java.util.stream.Stream;
034
035public final class Cypher {
036
037    private static Map<Enum<?>, String> defaultMappings = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
038    private static Map<Enum<?>, String> fieldNameMappings = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
039
040
041    public static Map<String, Object> toMap(ObjectNode json) {
042        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = json.fields();
043        Map<String, Object> map = new HashMap<>(json.size());
044        while (fields.hasNext()) {
045            Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> next = fields.next();
046
047            map.put(next.getKey(), switch (next.getValue().getNodeType()) {
048                case ARRAY -> toList((ArrayNode) next.getValue());
049                case OBJECT -> toMap((ObjectNode) next.getValue());
050                case STRING -> next.getValue().textValue();
051                case NUMBER -> next.getValue().numberValue();
052                case BINARY -> null;
053                case BOOLEAN -> Boolean.TRUE;
054                case MISSING -> null;
055                case NULL -> null;
056                case POJO -> null;
057            });
058        }
059        return map;
060    }
061
062    public static List<Object> toList(ArrayNode json) {
063        Iterator<JsonNode> fields = json.elements();
064        List<Object> list = new ArrayList<>(json.size());
065        while (fields.hasNext()) {
066            JsonNode next = fields.next();
067
068            list.add(switch (next.getNodeType()) {
069                case ARRAY -> toList((ArrayNode) next);
070                case OBJECT -> toMap((ObjectNode) next);
071                case STRING -> next.textValue();
072                case NUMBER -> next.numberValue();
073                case BINARY -> null;
074                case BOOLEAN -> Boolean.TRUE;
075                case MISSING -> null;
076                case NULL -> null;
077                case POJO -> null;
078            });
079        }
080        return list;
081    }
082
083    public static String toField(Enum<?> anEnum) {
084        return fieldNameMappings.computeIfAbsent(anEnum, e ->
085                e.getDeclaringClass().getSimpleName().toLowerCase() + "_" + e.name());
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * By default maps enums used for query results as:
090     * Some.name as some_name
091     * <p>
092     * Label enums can be used to return the node as a whole instead of a single property
093     * E.g. Label.SomeEntity -> SomeEntity as SomeEntity
094     *
095     * @return
096     */
097    public static Function<Enum<?>, String> defaultFieldMappings() {
098        return field ->
099                defaultMappings.computeIfAbsent(field, f ->
100                        {
101                            if (f.getDeclaringClass().getSimpleName().equals("Label")) {
102                                return f.name() + " as " + f.name();
103                            } else {
104                                return f.getDeclaringClass().getSimpleName() + "." + f.name() + " as " +
105                                        f.getDeclaringClass().getSimpleName().toLowerCase() + "_" + f.name();
106                            }
107                        }
108                );
109    }
110
111    public static ObjectNode toObjectNode(Map<String, Object> resultRow) {
112        ObjectNode node = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
113        for (Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : resultRow.entrySet()) {
114            node.set(entry.getKey(), toJsonNode(entry.getValue()));
115        }
116        return node;
117    }
118
119    public static JsonNode toJsonNode(Object value) {
120        if (value == null) {
121            return NullNode.getInstance();
122        } else if (value instanceof String v) {
123            return JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(v);
124        } else if (value instanceof Long v) {
125            return JsonNodeFactory.instance.numberNode(v);
126        } else if (value instanceof Double v) {
127            return JsonNodeFactory.instance.numberNode(v);
128        } else if (value instanceof Boolean v) {
129            return JsonNodeFactory.instance.booleanNode(v);
130        } else if (value instanceof List list) {
131            ArrayNode arrayNode = JsonNodeFactory.instance.arrayNode(list.size());
132            for (Object child : list) {
133                arrayNode.add(toJsonNode(child));
134            }
135            return arrayNode;
136        } else if (value instanceof Map map) {
137            ObjectNode objectNode = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
138            map.forEach((k, v) -> objectNode.set(k.toString(), toJsonNode(v)));
139            return objectNode;
140        } else if (value instanceof Node node) {
141            ObjectNode objectNode = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
142            for (Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : node.getAllProperties().entrySet()) {
143                objectNode.set(entry.getKey(), toJsonNode(entry.getValue()));
144            }
145            return objectNode;
146        } else {
147            return NullNode.getInstance();
148        }
149    }
150
151    public static List<String> getCypherStatements(String statementResourceFile)
152            throws IllegalArgumentException {
153        try (InputStream resourceAsStream = ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(statementResourceFile)) {
154            if (resourceAsStream == null)
155                throw new IllegalArgumentException("No such resource file:" + statementResourceFile);
156
157            return Stream.of(new String(resourceAsStream.readAllBytes(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
158                    .flatMap(s -> Stream.of(s.split(";")))
159                    .map(String::trim)
160                    .filter(s -> !s.isEmpty())
161                    .collect(Collectors.toList());
162        } catch (IOException e) {
163            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Could not load Cypher statements", e);
164        }
165    }
166
167    public static List<String> getCypherStatements(URL statementResourceFile)
168            throws IllegalArgumentException {
169        try (InputStream resourceAsStream = statementResourceFile.openStream()) {
170            if (resourceAsStream == null)
171                throw new IllegalArgumentException("No such resource file:" + statementResourceFile);
172
173            return Stream.of(new String(resourceAsStream.readAllBytes(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
174                    .flatMap(s -> Stream.of(s.split(";")))
175                    .map(String::trim)
176                    .filter(s -> !s.isEmpty())
177                    .collect(Collectors.toList());
178        } catch (IOException e) {
179            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Could not load Cypher statements", e);
180        }
181    }
182
183}
